title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 354: Featuring John Buccigross
description:
On Episode 354 of Spittinâ€™ Chiclets, the guys are joined by John Buccigross. Bucci joined the show (1:42:49) to discuss the new NHL-ESPN TV deal for this upcoming season, College Hockey, Jack Eichel, Hockey Culture and much more. But first, the boys open the show catching up on their weekends, dive into some concert talk and make a huge announcement for our Canadian listeners. The guys then break down all the recent NHL news and preview the entire Eastern Conference. The fellas wrap up the show talking about squid game and some other random things.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
